card.name: Accidental Portal to Hell (MOOK)
card.text: Remove up to two cards from under any target, then if that target is a machine or base and has no cards under it, blow it up.

card.name: Actual Serial Killer (MOOK)
card.text: This mook gets +1 for every mook in the trash.

card.name: Advantage Fabricator (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your arsenal under this card. Then if this card has 2 or more cards under it, liquidate it and put those cards into your hand.

card.name: Alan Horner, Paleontologist (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 base
When this mook starts or joins an operation, you can exchange up to two cards from your hand with that many cards from under one of your blueprints.

card.name: Alien Crash Site (MOOK)
card.text: Your scientists get +2 for each card under this base.

card.name: Apply Phlebotinum (MOOK)
card.text: Exchange up to three cards from your hand with that many cards from under any of your blueprints.

card.name: Arctic Ice Fortress (MOOK)
card.text:
Operations that target you or your mooks at home require an additional mook.
Whenever this base is blown up or liquidated, draw a card.

card.name: Armored Mook (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
Gets +2 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Average TV Pundit (MOOK)
card.text:
Your mooks can't be stolen.
The first time you declare an operation during your turn, you can have target enemy mook join that operation as if it was yours.

card.name: Base of Operations (MOOK)
card.text: Your operations cost 4 less.

card.name: Basement Hacker Den (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you assemble a blueprint, first declare a card type. If the card you assemble with isn't the declared type, you can put the top card of your arsenal under that same blueprint.

card.name: Big Game Hunter (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, reveal the top five cards of your arsenal. Put a mook from among them into your hand and bottom the rest.

card.name: Biohazard Fridge (MOOK)
card.text: When you fabricate this machine, target player tosses the top three cards of their arsenal.

card.name: Bootleg Satellite Hookup (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemies can't target your other machines.
When this machine is blown up, you can put it under one of your mooks, blueprints, or bases. If you don't, draw a card.

card.name: Buff Physicist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever this mook joins or leads an operation, draw a card.

card.name: Cardboard Facade (MOOK)
card.text: If your active base would be blown up, you can blow up this base instead. You can use this ability if this isn't your active base.

card.name: Clockwork Soldier (MOOK)
card.text: This machine can act as an operative with threat level 8. (While it's an operative it counts as a mook)

card.name: Convenient Accident (MOOK)
card.text: Target mook gets -8 until end of turn.

card.name: Dead Man's Switch (MOOK)
card.text:
Play this only when one of your unique mooks is blown up.
Blow up target mook, base, or machine. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Death Metal Bard (MOOK)
card.text: Your other mooks get +3.

card.name: Death Ray (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your arsenal under this card.

card.name: Defenestrate (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target unique mook or target mook with threat level 8 or higher.

card.name: Deploy Deadly Neurotoxin (MOOK)
card.text: Mooks get -5 from poison until end of turn.

card.name: Discount Quantum Singularity (MOOK)
card.text:
This machine can count toward one requirement of any type.
The first time you hire a mook that has a requirement during each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Doctor Zero, Chemist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy hires a mook that shares a name with any of your mooks, it onboards as a token mook. (It's facedown, nameless, and has threat level 5 and no abilities.)

card.name: Drafting Machine (MOOK)
card.text: When you assemble a blueprint, look at the top 3 cards of your arsenal, put one of them under that blueprint, and bottom the rest. Then bottom a card from under that blueprint.

card.name: Dragon Cosplayer (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, put the top two cards of your arsenal under it.
This mook gets +2 for each card under it.

card.name: Drone Pilot (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
Whenever you start an operation for the first time each turn, you can hire a token mook.

card.name: Encourage Forest Fires (MOOK)
card.text:
Discard or liquidate a mook as a cost.
Blow up target base, then draw a card.

card.name: Enhanced Employee (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 mook, 1 machine
You can play a second scheme each turn.

card.name: Escape Pods (MOOK)
card.text: When an operation targets you or your active base, you can liquidate this machine to stop it. You can use this ability if this machine is facedown by discarding a card as a cost.

card.name: Evil Doctor (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a blueprint from your arsenal in play.
To assemble a blueprint, exchange a card from under that blueprint with a card in your hand or a non-mook card from your trash.
Pressure: undefined
Static: The first time you hire one or more token mooks each turn, you hire that many plus one instead.

card.name: Evil Supercomputer (MOOK)
card.text: You can play an extra scheme each turn.

card.name: Fabricate Kludge (MOOK)
card.text: Flip one of your machines facedown, then fabricate it.

card.name: Fake My Death (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when you're targeted by an enemy ability or operation.
Stop it. Search your arsenal for a base and play it as your new active base.

card.name: Finn Dorset, Hired Biologist (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 4 mooks
Whenever another of your nontoken mooks is blown up, hire a token mook.

card.name: Flagbearer Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy targets one of your mooks, you can change the target to this mook. If you do, it gets +2 until end of turn.

card.name: Freelance Reporter (MOOK)
card.text: Enemy schemes that target you, your mooks, your bases, or your machines have "Discard a card as a cost."

card.name: Gas Mask Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Immune to poison.

card.name: Genetic Experiment Vat (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you would draw a card, you can liquidate this machine and a mook instead. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a unique mook. Hire the revealed mook, ignoring its requirements, then bottom the rest.

card.name: Gifted Programmer (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, fabricate a machine.
When you draw this card, you can reveal it to hire it.

card.name: Gobblin' Goon (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, remove up to two cards from under any target.

card.name: Grant Luck, Opportunist (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, put the top 2 cards of your arsenal under it.
Whenever you would draw a card, you can put a card from under this card into your hand instead.

card.name: Hacked Lucky Cat (MOOK)
card.text: The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top card of your arsenal. You can toss that card. Then draw a card.

card.name: Hamster Treadmill (MOOK)
card.text:
When you fabricate this machine, you can fabricate an additional machine this turn.
This machine can act as an operative with threat level 2. When it joins an operation this way, draw a card.(While it's an operative it counts as a mook)

card.name: Hand Out RPGs (MOOK)
card.text: Until end of turn, your mooks have Operation Roll For Initiative (8) — Blow up target machine.

card.name: Haunted Castle (MOOK)
card.text: You can fabricate an additional machine each turn. When you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hazmat Trooper (MOOK)
card.text: Immune to poison, disease, and radiation.

card.name: High-Powered Hologram Projector (MOOK)
card.text:
Your active base can't be targeted. You can't change your active base except with abilities.
Operation Move Out (5) — Change your active base to one of your other bases.

card.name: Hire Contractor (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires turn 3 or later
Hire a mook from your hand, ignoring its requirements.

card.name: Hold for Ransom (MOOK)
card.text:
Put this card under target enemy mook and steal it. It can't start or join operations or use any abilities.
Whenever its owner would draw a card, they can have you draw two cards instead. If they do, put this card in the garbage pile and this ability ends.

card.name: HR Representative (MOOK)
card.text: You can liquidate mooks instead of other card types to pay costs. The first time you do each turn, hire a token mook.

card.name: Hulking Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 2 mooks

card.name: Human Resources HQ (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you liquidate one or more mooks, reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a mook. Put it into your hand and bottom the rest.

card.name: Indenture Wildlife (MOOK)
card.text: Hire a token mook, then if you have 3 or fewer mooks, hire another one.

card.name: Indomitable Mook (MOOK)
card.text: This mook has threat level 6 and cannot be blown up by schemes or mooks.

card.name: Industrial Wasp Nest (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you draw one or more cards, target mook gets -2 until end of turn for each card you drew.

card.name: Inflict Harrowing Mutation (MOOK)
card.text: Target mook becomes unique. Its owner tosses all other copies of it from their arsenal.

card.name: Influencer for Hire (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, until your next turn, you can target enemies that can't be targeted.

card.name: Intern Engineer (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, assemble one of your blueprints.

card.name: Invest in Crypto (MOOK)
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your arsenal. Hire one as a token mook, put one into your hand, and toss the last one.

card.name: Island Skull Base (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemies can't target your blueprints or mooks.
Operations can't target you unless they have total threat level 30 or more.

card.name: Kid's Science Museum (MOOK)
card.text: Operation Field Trip (20) — Send away any number of target mooks. Until end of turn, they're scientists and have a great time.

card.name: Lab Rat Escape (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target machine or facedown card.

card.name: Labcoat Distributor (MOOK)
card.text: Your mooks are also scientists.

card.name: Laser Grid Defense (MOOK)
card.text:
You can fabricate this machine whenever you're targeted by an operation, but before operatives are selected.
Operations that target you can't include mooks with threat level 4 or lower.

card.name: Lasergun Enforcer (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
Your other Lasergun Enforcers get +2.

card.name: Lovable Brute (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you assemble a blueprint, you can use a card from your hand instead of the top card of your arsenal.

card.name: Manipulative Chatbot (MOOK)
card.text: Onboarding abilities of mooks you onboard trigger twice.

card.name: Metal Fist Bruiser (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
This mook gets +2 for each of your machines.

card.name: Minion Fabricator (MOOK)
card.text: Once per turn, whenever you hire a nontoken mook, hire a token mook.

card.name: Mook Lobbyist (MOOK)
card.text: Operation I Need Your Support (5) — Reveal the top card of your arsenal. If it's a scheme, put it into your hand.

card.name: Mook Mastermind (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 4 or more schemes in your garbage pile

card.name: Mook Teamlead (MOOK)
card.text: This mook gets +2 for each of your other mooks.

card.name: Mook Technician (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, you can fabricate an additional machine this turn.

card.name: Moon Base (MOOK)
card.text:
Operations can't target you unless they have 3 or fewer operatives.
Enemies can't target your machines or facedown cards.

card.name: Nautical Station (MOOK)
card.text: Enemies can't target you except with operations of total threat level 20 or more.

card.name: Obsessed Engineer (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a blueprint from your arsenal in play.
To assemble a blueprint, exchange a card from under that blueprint with a card in your hand or a non-mook card from your trash.
Pressure: undefined
Static: Whenever you fabricate a machine, your next operation this turn costs 4 less.

card.name: Octopus Trainer (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemy mooks have +1 to each of their requirements.
Whenever you hire a nontoken mook, you can discard a card. If you do, hire a token mook.

card.name: Outsource Violence (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires turn 3 or later
Hire three token mooks.

card.name: Perform Petty Larceny (MOOK)
card.text: Choose target enemy and name a card type. They toss the top three cards of their arsenal, and you draw a card for each tossed card of the chosen type.

card.name: Plan Ahead (MOOK)
card.text: Draw two cards. If you performed your faction action this turn, draw three cards instead.

card.name: Power Plant (MOOK)
card.text: You can fabricate an additional machine during each of your turns.

card.name: Professor Kismet (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, bottom your hand and draw that many cards. If you didn't draw any cards this way, put the top card of your arsenal under one of your blueprints.

card.name: Queen of Criminality (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 mook, 1 machine
At the end of your turn, any player can discard a card. If no one does, blow up target machine and draw a card.

card.name: Quickdraw Cowboy (MOOK)
card.text: This mook can't be blown up.

card.name: Racecar Mechanic (MOOK)
card.text: Operation Pit Maneuver (6) — Reveal the top card of your arsenal. If it's a machine, put it facedown. If not, toss it.

card.name: Replace With a Double (MOOK)
card.text: Play only when a player hires a mook from their hand. That mook onboards as a token mook. (It's facedown, nameless, and has threat level 5 and no abilities.)

card.name: Reveal Conspiracy (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when an enemy plays a scheme.
You choose the targets for that scheme. If it has no targets, you perform that scheme's actions instead.

card.name: Reveal Plot Device (MOOK)
card.text: Liquidate one of your machines, then remove up to three cards from under any target.

card.name: Rocket Trooper (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
Whenever an enemy starts an operation, this mook gets +2 until end of turn. Then, you can blow up target operative with equal or lower threat level.

card.name: Scale Down (MOOK)
card.text: Each player liquidates a mook, base, or machine.

card.name: Scavenge for Parts (MOOK)
card.text: Toss cards from the top of your arsenal until you find a machine card. Put that card into your hand.

card.name: Scheme Exponentially (MOOK)
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your arsenal. Put all the schemes among those cards into your hand, and toss the rest. You can play another scheme this turn.

card.name: Search the Deep Web (MOOK)
card.text: Search your arsenal for a machine or for a mook with threat level 5 or less. Put it into your hand. Then, toss two cards from the top of your arsenal.

card.name: Secret Agent Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Lone Operative (This mook can lead any of your operations by itself)

card.name: Self Destruct (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when you're targeted for an operation.
Blow up target operative. Draw a card.

card.name: Shoot First (MOOK)
card.text: Play only when one of your operatives is targeted by an enemy mook. Blow up that mook.

card.name: Sinister Academic (MOOK)
card.text: Your schemes can't be stopped.

card.name: Skilled Therapist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you hire a token mook, look at it. If it's a mook, flip it faceup.

card.name: Sleep with the Fishes (MOOK)
card.text: Target player liquidates their mook with the lowest threat level.

card.name: Small Hadron Collider (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, you can liquidate this machine. If you do, blow up target machine or base.

card.name: Social Engineering Major (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, steal target machine.

card.name: Sorting Machine (MOOK)
card.text: When you fabricate this machine, look at the top three cards of your arsenal and put them back in any order.

card.name: Steal Inheritance (MOOK)
card.text:
Discard a card as a cost.
Draw three cards.

card.name: Striker Marks, Union Leader (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 3 mooks
When you complete your first operation each turn, start it again with the same operatives. You can choose new targets.

card.name: Super Villain (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a blueprint from your arsenal in play.
To assemble a blueprint, exchange a card from under that blueprint with a card in your hand or a non-mook card from your trash.
Pressure: undefined
Static: Whenever a player plays a scheme that targets one or more of your blueprints, draw a card.

card.name: Supportive Henchman (MOOK)
card.text: Operations this mook leads cost 4 less.

card.name: Test Experimental Weapon (MOOK)
card.text: Liquidate a machine as a cost. Blow up target mook.

card.name: Thief Mook (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook returns home for the first time each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Threaten Endangered Animals (MOOK)
card.text: Search your arsenal for up to three machines. Choose one of them in secret and put it facedown. After you shuffle, put one of the remaining cards on top and bottom the rest.

card.name: Throw a Surprise Party (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when an enemy's mooks return home.
Choose one of those mooks and send away the rest.

card.name: Tie To The Train Tracks (MOOK)
card.text: Steal target mook until your next turn, or until it's targeted by an enemy operation. As long as it's yours, it can't start or join operations and your other mooks can't be targeted.

card.name: Transport a Prefab (MOOK)
card.text: Search your arsenal for a base and put it into your hand. You can't play bases with that name this turn.

card.name: Twinned Siblings (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, hire a token mook.

card.name: Underwater Bubble Dome (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, you can liquidate a machine. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Unguarded Shark Tank (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy starts an operation, you can liquidate this machine. If you do, stop that operation, and that player can't start any more operations this turn.

card.name: Universal Protester (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, target player tosses the top three cards of their arsenal.

card.name: Unlicensed Disintegration (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target machine, then draw a card. Then discard a card if it wasn't your machine.

card.name: Vaccination Conspiracist (MOOK)
card.text:
Immune to scientists
Schemes your enemies play require 1 mook.

card.name: Villainous Lapcat (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy starts an operation that targets you, if this mook is at home, you can liquidate it to stop that operation and blow up target operative.

card.name: WMD Enthusiast (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, blow up every mook. Until end of turn, whenever a mook onboards, it's blown up by radiation.

card.name: Wonder Hunter (MOOK)
card.text:
Your Scientists get +2.
Your operatives can't be targeted by schemes or mooks.

card.name: You Got It Boss (MOOK)
card.text: Until end of turn, operations your mooks start or join can't be stopped.
